align.description: Set the text-align on the component.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

color.description: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.
Overrides the behavior of the `variantMapping` prop.

gutterBottom.description: If `true`, the text will have a bottom margin.

noWrap.description:
If `true`, the text will not wrap, but instead will truncate with a text overflow ellipsis.

Note that text overflow can only happen with block or inline-block level elements
(the element needs to have a width in order to overflow).

paragraph.description: If `true`, the text will have a bottom margin.

variantMapping.description:
The component maps the variant prop to a range of different DOM element types.
For instance, subtitle1 to `<h6>`.
If you wish to change that mapping, you can provide your own.
Alternatively, you can use the `component` prop.

defaultValue.value:
{
  h1: 'h1',
  h2: 'h2',
  h3: 'h3',
  h4: 'h4',
  h5: 'h5',
  h6: 'h6',
  subtitle1: 'h6',
  subtitle2: 'h6',
  body1: 'p',
  body2: 'p',
}

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.body2: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="body2"`.
descriptions.body1: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="body1"`.
descriptions.caption: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="caption"`.
descriptions.button: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="button"`.
descriptions.h1: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="h1"`.
descriptions.h2: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="h2"`.
descriptions.h3: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="h3"`.
descriptions.h4: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="h4"`.
descriptions.h5: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="h5"`.
descriptions.h6: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="h6"`.
descriptions.subtitle1: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="subtitle1"`.
descriptions.subtitle2: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="subtitle2"`.
descriptions.overline: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="overline"`.
descriptions.srOnly: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="srOnly"`. Only accessible to screen readers.
descriptions.alignLeft: Styles applied to the root element if `align="left"`.
descriptions.alignCenter: Styles applied to the root element if `align="center"`.
descriptions.alignRight: Styles applied to the root element if `align="right"`.
descriptions.alignJustify: Styles applied to the root element if `align="justify"`.
descriptions.noWrap: Styles applied to the root element if `nowrap={true}`.
descriptions.gutterBottom: Styles applied to the root element if `gutterBottom={true}`.
descriptions.paragraph: Styles applied to the root element if `paragraph={true}`.
descriptions.colorInherit: Styles applied to the root element if `color="inherit"`.
descriptions.colorPrimary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="primary"`.
descriptions.colorSecondary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="secondary"`.
descriptions.colorTextPrimary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="textPrimary"`.
descriptions.colorTextSecondary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="textSecondary"`.
descriptions.colorError: Styles applied to the root element if `color="error"`.
descriptions.displayInline: Styles applied to the root element if `display="inline"`.
descriptions.displayBlock: Styles applied to the root element if `display="block"`.
